title: style green beans
description: Gentle Asian spices warm up this pork and mushroom pie with fluffy mash topping. A real winter warmer.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
680g/1½lb pork, cut into 1-2cm/½in cubes (shoulder or leg, fat removed)
300g/11oz button mushrooms, wiped clean and sliced or left whole or quartered if they are small
1kg/2lb 3oz floury potatoes (such as King Edward), cleaned (not peeled)
200ml/7fl oz boiling milk (or 150ml/¼ pint boiling milk and 60ml/2fl oz single cream)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 garlic cloves, peeled and very finely chopped
1 hot, dried red chilli, coarsely crushed in a mortar
salt and freshly ground black pepper
